thread.title: Britain to send 10,000 drones to Ukraine in major show of support
thread.title_full: Britain to send 10,000 drones to Ukraine in major show of support

author: Georgia Pearce Published
title: Britain to send 10,000 drones to Ukraine in major show of support
text: [Eamonn Holmes](/presenters/eamonn-holmes/) [Nigel Farage](/presenters/nigel-farage/) [Isabel Webster](/presenters/isabel-webster/) [Jacob Rees-Mogg](/presenters/jacob-rees-mogg/) [Michelle Dewberry](/presenters/michelle-dewberry/) [Patrick Christys](/presenters/patrick-christys/) [Nana Akua](/presenters/nana-akua/) [Stephen Dixon](/presenters/stephen-dixon/) [Anne Diamond](/presenters/anne-diamond/) [Andrew Pierce](/presenters/andrew-pierce/) [Beverley Turner](/presenters/beverley-turner/) [Mark Longhurst](/presenters/mark-longhurst/) [Mark Dolan](/presenters/mark-dolan/) [Camilla Tominey](/presenters/camilla-tominey/) [Michael Portillo](/presenters/michael-portillo/) [Gloria De Piero](/presenters/gloria-de-piero/) [Neil Oliver](/presenters/neil-oliver/) [Tom Harwood](/presenters/tom-harwood/) [Andrew Doyle](/presenters/andrew-doyle/) [Philip Davies](/presenters/philip-davies/) [Emily Carver](/presenters/emily-carver/) [Simon Evans](/presenters/simon-evans/) [Arlene Foster](/presenters/arlene-foster/) [Olivia Utley](/presenters/olivia-utley/) [Liam Halligan](/presenters/liam-halligan/) [Ellie Costello](/presenters/ellie-costello/) [Darren Grimes](/presenters/darren-grimes/) [Mark White](/presenters/mark-white/) [Cameron Walker](/presenters/cameron-walker/) Published: 07/03/2024- 21:11 he UK is sending a further 10,000 military drones to Ukraine, as part of a massive ramping up of the embattled nation's drone capability. The announcement was made by UK Defence Secretary Grant Shapps, as he visited Ukraine on Thursday, along with the Chief of the Defence Staff, Admiral Sir Tony Radakin.
